Education.Description: In my time at Chas Academy, I've learned a wide range of technologies such as C#, Javascript, HTML, CSS, React, ASP.NET, .NET Core and more. I've also learned and practiced agile work methodologies. Chas Academy has provided me with all the skills needed to have a great starting point with my transition into the tech industry.

This program explores the synergy between sound and image across various media, including film, television, web, video games, and music. It offers in-depth exploration and fresh perspectives, blending artistic and scientific approaches.

In this program, I've learned the ins and outs of sound and audio production, how to utilize audio equipment both for recording and playback. I've also learned how to produce and mix audio projects such as music and sound design.
